Title: Mischief Night
Writer: Jesse Baget (story), Jesse Baget, Richard Schenkman (screenplay), Eric D. Wilkinson (story)
Actors: Ian Bamberg, Noell Coet, Adam C. Edwards, Stephanie Erb
Plot: Young Emily Walton, who has suffered from psychosomatic blindness ever since the car accident that took her mother's life, must summon every instinct at her disposal to protect herself and her loved ones from a mysterious intruder.
